rules_text: Whenever a nontoken land with two or more card types you control enters, create a token that is a copy of that land.
notes:
Needs_Art
Major Edits

Whenever an Enchantment Land enters, search your library for an Enchantment Land or Room card and add it to your hand, then shuffle.

Whenever an Enchantment Land enters, you may search your library for an Enchantment Land card or Room card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
